posts.post_content: When I saw this, I was immediately excited. Because my first thought was, "This card is horrible!" I couldn't wait to read the comments and hear what inventive, cool combos people thought up. All in all, it's sideboard tech with Zedruu, and a Donate/Alter Reality combo. Which is pretty impressive. But I was expecting something a bit more lockdown than that. I'll just have to build around it myself, I guess.

posts.post_content: this + [donate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=donate) + [alter reality](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=alter reality) if u are playing against a mono-colored deck for expample u change the word "blue" to "white". that way ur opponent must pay one blue mana for each white spell he plays, so he practicly cant play white spells at all.
